document.name: 'Zarafa' Movie Screening | Family Movie Night | World Cinema
document.short_description:
Family Movie Night: World Cinema for Kids!


Join us as we watch a series of carefully curated rare masterpieces from around the world, made just for kids. All this under the night sky, while cozying up with family!


'Zarafa' follows the remarkable journey of a young Sudanese boy named Maki, who escapes from the clutches of slave traders and embarks on a quest to rescue a baby giraffe named Zarafa. Along the way, Maki encounters a kind-hearted Frenchman named Hassan, who promises to help him return Zarafa to her rightful home in Africa.


Event Highlights


Broaden Horizons with Global Tales: Dive into diverse artistic expressions through rare masterpieces curated for children.


Cultivate Cultural Curiosity: Spark interest in world cinema and inspire exploration of different cultures through the enchantment of film.


Quality Family Bonding: Embark on a cinematic journey to a new country each month, forging lasting memories and strengthening family connections.


Why Attend?


Uncover Hidden Treasures: Discover lesser-known gems handpicked for their artistic brilliance and captivating storytelling.


Artistic Excellence: Immerse your child in films of unparalleled artistic merit, fueling their imagination and creativity.


Safe Family Environment: Enjoy movies in a secure, family-friendly setting, ensuring a worry-free experience for kids and parents alike.


Don't miss this opportunity to create lasting memories with your family while exposing your kids to the wonders of world cinema.


Join us for Family Movie Night – where the magic of storytelling knows no bounds!

document.name: Kids Playdate | Dragons Love Tacos
document.short_description:
Ticket Includes All Activities by The LooRoo Club for One Kid and One accompanying parent

Who is it for?

Children aged 4+ years accompanied by one adult who can join in the play alongside their child at no additional cost.


About the Playdate


This playdate is centered around the New York Times bestseller, "Dragons Love Tacos" by Adam Rubin! This story is a hit with us because it combines two of our favorite things: dragons and tacos. Get ready for a day filled with fun activities like making dragon crafts, whipping up tasty salsa (mild, of course!), and throwing an epic taco party that even dragons would love!


But wait, there's more fun to come! We'll also recreate the structures inspired by what the dragons built after their fiery adventures in the book because every dragon needs a cozy spot to hang out.


And to wrap it all up, we'll feast on delicious tacos together. Join us for a day of laughter, creativity, and lots of taco love, just like the parties dragons love to have!


Terms and Conditions


  • The management bears no responsibility for any injury or damage incurred during the event.
  • Purchase tickets exclusively from the designated ticketing platform.
  • No refunds for no-shows or cancellations under any circumstances.
  • Tickets are non-transferable and intended for personal use only.
  • Event schedule and menu subject to change in case of emergencies or events beyond our control.
  • The management will not entertain liability claims arising from the consumption of food or beverages.
  • Parking near the event venue is at the vehicle owner's risk. Paid valet parking available at Rs. 200 per car.
  • Ticket holders grant organizers perpetual rights to use any recorded video or still footage of their appearance on any channel, without further approval.

document.name: Record Store Day 2024
document.short_description:
About the Event


Record Store Day in Collaboration with On the Jungle Floor (OTJF) is a celebration of vinyl, flavor, and community from noon till sundown. Get your tickets now for exclusive vinyl deals, a day of beats that span eras! Enjoy delicious food and local art. 


Vinyl DJs at the yard


1.⁠ ⁠On the Jungle Floor

2.⁠ ⁠Ode

3.⁠ ⁠Grind Selects

4.⁠ ⁠Hamza Rahimtula


Art Market in the Studio


1.⁠ ⁠Roja Studios

2.⁠ ⁠Vintage Laundry

3.⁠ ⁠The Little Watch Society

4.⁠ ⁠Ashokavanam Farms

5.⁠ ⁠Cosmic Roach Studio

6.⁠ ⁠Bagiecha x Crasky 


Food & Beverage by


1.⁠ ⁠Tushar and Varun

2.⁠ ⁠Karan Upamanyu

3.⁠ ⁠Wine In Progress

4.⁠ ⁠Grind Bar

document.name: Taco Shop at The Conservatory

custom_questions.question: Number of vegetarians in the group
Number of Non- Vegetarians in the group

document.short_description:
We might not have rains in Bangalore, but it will definitely be raining tacos in the Conservatory!


Indulge in a two-day ‘Taco Shop’ at the Conservatory showcasing the culinary mastery of Chefs Tushar Sood and Varun Pereira. Come, grab, eat & go!


Menu


Amuse 

Escabeche 

(House pickled veggies) with Cream & Onion Dip.


Tacos 


1. Shroom Quesa Birria (Rs. 525)

(Fresh corn tortilla stuffed with Slow Roasted Wild mushrooms, Cheese & Red Onions served with Spicy Ancho Chilli Consommé)


2. Lamb Quesa Birria (Rs. 770)

(Fresh corn tortilla stuffed with Slow cooked Lamb, Cheese & Red Onions served with Spicy Ancho Chilli Consommé)


3. Carnitas de Pollo (Rs. 630)

(8 hour slow cooked Chicken marinated in Orange juice & Fresh Oregano, Pickled onions, Charred Jalapeño, Cilantro Salsa)


4. Cochinita pibil (Rs. 735)

(Yucatan style BBQ Pork Leg wrapped in Banana leaf, Orange juice pickled onion & jalapeño slaw, Salsa El Diablo with a side of Chicharrones)


5. Suadero (Rs. 735)

(Tallow confit Beef Brisket, Salsa Roja, Tomatillo Verde & Pico de gallo)


Tostadas


1. Sweet potato & Black Bean (Rs. 490)

(Charcoal Roasted Sweet Potato, Black beans, Avocado Mayo, Pickled Peppers & Charred Corn-Cialntro Salsa)


2. Aguachille De Pescado (Rs. 630)

(Fish & Prawn marinated in Gooseberry Salsa with Garlic Cream, Cucumber & Dill Slaw, Crush nachos & Avocados)


3. Huevos rancheros (Rs. 595)

(Chorizo Chilli, Marbled egg, Salsa Roja, Crumble feta, Bacon Salsa macha & Avocados)


Dessert 


1. Sopaipillas (Rs. 490)

with Caramelised Bananas, Dulce de leche & Crema Fresca


2. Bionico (Rs. 490)

Street style Dessert Cups with Fresh fruit, Ice cream, Granola & Coconut


Terms and Conditions :

  • The management is not responsible for any injury or damage that may occur during an event.
  • Do not purchase tickets from anyone other than on the ticketing platform.
  • Each slot, lasting 2 hours only, requires attendance at the booked time, with no accommodation for attendance at any other slot except the one booked.
  • No shows and cancellations are non-refundable by all means.
  • Tickets are non-transferable and are for personal use only.
  • The schedule is subject to change in case of an emergency or any event out of our control.
  • Children over 3 years of age require a ticket.
  • No liability or claims that may arise due to the consumption or intake of any food or drink will be entertained by the management.
  • Parking near the event premises is at the risk of the vehicle owner.
  • Paid Valet Parking at Rs. 200 per car.
  • The holder of this ticket grants organizers the right to use, in perpetuity, all or any part of the recording of any video or still footage made of the holder's appearance on any channel without any further approval of theirs.

document.short_description:
About the movie


"Little Miss Sunshine" follows the quirky Hoover family as they embark on a road trip to support Olive, their daughter, in a beauty pageant. Along the way, they confront their individual struggles and dysfunctionalities, but ultimately come together, learning valuable lessons about love, acceptance, and the true meaning of family. This heartwarming comedy-drama captivates with its memorable characters and humorous yet touching storyline.


3-Course Menu by Fermentation Stories


Appetiser

Sweet potato croquettes


Main Course

Sourdough Ratatouille (V)

Sourdough smoky chicken and mushroom (NV)


Dessert

Salted caramel Banana Brownie

document.address: Ground Floor, 52 5th cross, 60 Feet Rd, KHB Colony, 6th Block, Koramangala, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560095, India
document.booking_confirmation_message:
Food is not just about taste; it's also about the memories and experiences we create around it. By attending this Table, you're participating in a shared experience that can create lasting memories and stories to cherish.

Indian cuisine is incredibly diverse, with a wide range of flavors, ingredients, and cooking techniques. This Table allows you to explore dishes you may not have encountered before.

We are excited to host you at Jugni, Koramangala.
document.cancellation_policy:
Refunds:

Refunds will be issued only in cases where the event is cancelled by the organizers.

Refund requests made by attendees will be considered up to 2 days prior to the event date.

A processing fee may apply to refund requests initiated by attendees.

Refunds will be processed within 2 business days after approval.


Cancellations:

Attendees must notify the organizers of any cancellations at least 2 days before the event date.

Cancellations made after the specified deadline may not be eligible for a refund.

The organizers reserve the right to cancel or reschedule the event due to unforeseen circumstances. In such cases, attendees will be notified promptly, and refunds will be issued accordingly.


Transfer of Tickets:

Tickets are non-transferable without prior approval from the organizers.

Requests for ticket transfers must be made in writing and approved by the organizers.


No-show Policy:

Attendees who do not show up for the event without prior notice will not be eligible for a refund.

By registering for the event, attendees agree to abide by the refund and cancellation policy outlined above. The organizers reserve the right to amend or update this policy as necessary.

document.name: Unapologetically Indian Table

custom_questions.question: Your favourite Indian dish (sweet or savoury)

document.short_description:
Are you ready to embark on a flavorful adventure and make some new friends along the way? Join us for an exciting Indian food Table designed especially for strangers eager to explore the world of Indian cuisine with a twist together.

Experience the vibrant spices, rich flavors, and diverse dishes of Indian cuisine in the company of fellow enthusiasts. Whether you're a seasoned connoisseur or new to Indian food, this event promises to be a delightful culinary journey.

﻿This meet up isn't just about food—it's also an opportunity to connect with like-minded individuals, share stories, and perhaps even forge new friendships over a shared love of great food.

document.name: Sri Lankan New Year Feast
document.short_description:
Join us as we gather to savour a traditional Sri Lankan feast. Experience the vibrant colors, rich aromas, and mouthwatering flavors of our beloved New Year delicacies, lovingly prepared by award winning Chef Priya Bala to usher in prosperity and happiness for the year ahead.

Indulge in a sumptuous spread featuring traditional dishes such as Kiribath, Idiappam Biryani, Bhath Parcel, Sago Pudding and sambols that showcase the diverse flavors of Sri Lankan cuisine.

This celebration isn't just about food—it's a time to make new friends over shared experiences.

document.address: 549A, 9th A Main Rd, Hoysala Nagar, Indiranagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560038, India
document.booking_confirmation_message:
Thank you for buying a ticket for our Indian Craft Chocolate + Coffee Pairing event on Saturday 13th April.


The event starts at 11.30 sharp, please reach 10 minutes early so we can start on time. We look forward to serving you up coffee and delicious craft chocolate pairings and lots of interesting conversations over chocolate.


You can find us here: https://maps.app.goo.gl/XMr6S1m1sM7HdpEq5?g_st=ic

Please note we are a little hard to find, as we are tucked away in a converted bungalow. Look out for the blue colour gate and the Paper Boat Collective sign- we can be found in the garden. We are opposite Bajaj Capital.


There is limited street parking in this area and we do not have valet. If possible please take a cab or a drop to avoid a stressful parking situation.

document.name: Coffee + Chocolate Pairing with Patricia
document.short_description:
Join us for a coffee + chocolate pairing experience with Patricia, Founder of the Indian Craft Chocolate Festival, joined by Umar Founder of Ground Up and Sarah, Founder of Copper + Cloves.


You we'll learn about specialty coffee and craft chocolate and how to pair these two for an amazingly delicious sensory experience.

We will taste different Indian craft chocolates from makers around the country and different coffee beans and brews.


This will be a unique experience and a chance to meet wonderful people on a Saturday morning

account_data.company_description: We are all about nourishing food and creating spaces for connection!

document.address: 549A, 9th A Main Rd, Hoysala Nagar, Indiranagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560038, India

Thank you for signing up, we are super excited to host you.

Please do help us plan your experience better by choosing your menu options from the link below.

Copper + Cloves.
document.cancellation_policy: The tickets are non- refundable, but can be transferred to a family/friend.
